h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location
content: With these three fights completed, you now need to wait until you enter Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. While exploring, you will stumble upon the Relief of the Fallen Loong and Yellow Loong past the rope bridges in the middle of the hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Lining.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Lining', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location'.
The content is as follows:
With these three fights completed, you now need to wait until you enter Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. While exploring, you will stumble upon the Relief of the Fallen Loong and Yellow Loong past the rope bridges in the middle of the hollow.
